src:
Milojević spremio iznenađenje, Son i Kejn napadaju Zvezdu
06 Nov 2019, 19:51 by Milos
Crvena zvezda dočekuje Totenhem u susretu četvrtog kola B grupe Lige šampiona. Utakmica na stadionu „Rajko Mitić“ počinje u 21 sat.
Sudijska komisija UEFA je ovaj meč poverila Špancu Karlosu del Sero Grandeu. Za pomoćne arbitre na meču određeni su Huan Karlos Juste i Roberto Alonso, dok je četvrti sudija Hose Luis Montero.
Treneri Vladan Milojević i Mauricio Poketino odlučili su se za sledeće sastave:
CRVENA ZVEZDA: Borjan – Gobeljić, Degenek, Milunović, Rodić – Jovančić, Petrović – Garsija, Marin, Van la Para – Pavkov.
Na klupi su: Popović, Pankov, Vulić, Boaći, Žander, Simić, Kanjas,
TOTENHEM: Gazaniga – Fojt, Dajer, Sančez, Rouz – Ndombele, Sisoko – Dele, Lo Selso, Son – Kejn.
Klupa: Vord, Aldervild, Sesenjon, Eriksen, Moura, Skip, Dejvis.
Crvena zvezda je trenutno treća na tabeli B grupe sa tri osvojena boda, dok je Totenhem drugi sa četiri boda.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Milojevic saves surprise, Son and Kane attack Star
06 Nov 2019, 18:51 by Milos
The Red Star welcomes Tottenham to the fourth round of Group B of the Champions League. The match at the Rajko Mitic Stadium starts at 9 pm.
The UEFA Refereeing Committee entrusted this match to Spain's Carlos del Sero Grande. Juan Carlos Carlos Juste and Roberto Alonso were appointed as the arbiter of the match, with Jose Luis Montero as the fourth judge.
Coaches Vladan Milojevic and Mauricio Poketino opted for the following teams:
RED STAR: Borjan - Gobeljic, Degenek, Milunovic, Rodic - Jovancic, Petrovic - Garcia, Marin, Van La Para - Pavkov.
On the bench are: Popovic, Pankov, Vulic, Boaci, Zander, Simic, Kanjas,
TOTENHEM: Gazaniga - Foyt, Dyer, Sanchez, Rose - Ndombele, Sissoko - Dele, Lo Selso, Son - Kane.
Bench: Ward, Aldervild, Cessenon, Eriksen, Moura, Skip, Davis.
The Red Star is currently third in the Group B table with three points scored, while Tottenham is second with four points.
